messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: As someone who was born, educated and worked in this area all my life, I feel I understand far better than Westminster politicians what we need. I have recently become involved in politics and feel I can contribute to making Redcar a better place to live, work and bring up a family. That is why I am standing in this election to give people like you and me a voice that needs to be heard. I believe I am the one to fight for this town and its businesses.

leaflet.personalStatement: As someone who was born, educated and worked in this area all my life, I feel I understand far better than Westminster politicians what we need.
